About

The magical Nzambani rock locally known ai Ivia ya Nzambani, is a stone outcrop standing approximately 600 feet 183 meter above the ground.

The rock is situated about 8 kilometers from Kitui town along busy rough Kitui-Mutitu road at Nzambana market in Kitui.

It is believed that going round the rock could change your gender.Ivya ya Nzambani as known to the Kamba community is unique and attractive
